project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts, storing the contacts in a JSON file and interacting with the user through the terminal.

task.name: Implement searching for a contact feature
Implement JSON file storage for contacts
Implement user interface for terminal interaction (menu options)
Write tests to ensure all features work correctly
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure proper functionality
